title: Episode 181: Sherri Papini - Part 2
description:
Update: After we recorded this episode, Sherri agreed to plead guilty to lying to a federal agent and mail fraud. Once more is known, we will release an update on our Patreon

Investigators listened to the stories she spun, however, cutting-edge technology revealed what really happened to the missing supermom from Northern California. The tale she wove unraveled quickly, and she would soon, finally, face consequences.

Click here for tickets to our live show at Moontower, Just for Laughs in Austin, TX - Friday, 4/15, 7: 30 pm

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
